meetings.title: May
speaker: Laurie Cooper
Marissa Caldwell
meetings.time: Networking at 12:00 pm, Business meeting at 12:30 pm, Speaker at 1:30 pm
meetings.topic:
A Crash Course in Online Advertising For Authors

Join the Pub-Craft Team as they teach you how to execute an effective promo push, including how to easily book ads online, cultivate your own network of useful contacts, use social media as a powerful promo tool, and engage in effective and affordable outreach and promotion.

Meeting will be held via Zoom.The password will be posted on the Central Ohio Fiction Writers Group page which can be accessed via the Romance Writers of America website under the Forums tab.

meetings.topic:
Bookbrush

Join us for a fun live walk-through of the Book Brush tools & see how easy it is to create your own eye-catching images. See why authors say that Book Brush saves them both time and money!
